metadata.name: An Exquisite Slice
metadata.description:
"An Exquisite Slice" refers to a slice of apple that caters to exquisite tastes, featuring a hint of gold. This temptation draws one towards the beautiful red apple slices, revealing their true colours. It's akin to the pages of history where the apple symbolises allure and temptation, eventually revealing its true nature as the story unfolds.

The technique used to create this art and its meaning of temptation is the AI polaroid emulsion lift on an apple slice with a hint of gold.
